event.description: Ian Kinsler flies out to left fielder Carlos Quentin.
Omar Vizquel strikes out swinging.
Marlon Byrd grounds out, second baseman Chris Getz to first baseman Paul Konerko.
Hank Blalock homers (8) on a fly ball to right field.
Nelson Cruz grounds out, third baseman Wilson Betemit to first baseman Paul Konerko.
David Murphy grounds out, second baseman Chris Getz to first baseman Paul Konerko.
Chris Davis strikes out swinging.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia grounds out, second baseman Chris Getz to first baseman Paul Konerko.

Marlon Byrd reaches on a throwing error by third baseman Wilson Betemit.
Hank Blalock walks. Marlon Byrd to 2nd.

David Murphy flies out to center fielder Brent Lillibridge.
Chris Davis homers (8) on a fly ball to center field.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia strikes out swinging.
Elvis Andrus singles on a line drive to center fielder Brent Lillibridge.
Ian Kinsler singles on a bunt ground ball to third baseman Wilson Betemit. Elvis Andrus to 2nd.
Omar Vizquel doubles (4) on a line drive to right fielder Jermaine Dye. Elvis Andrus scores. Ian Kinsler to 3rd.
Marlon Byrd walks.

Nelson Cruz walks. Ian Kinsler scores. Omar Vizquel to 3rd. Marlon Byrd to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Clayton Richard replaces Bartolo Colon.
David Murphy singles on a ground ball to second baseman Chris Getz. Omar Vizquel scores. Marlon Byrd to 3rd. Nelson Cruz to 2nd.
Chris Davis flies out to center fielder Brent Lillibridge.
Pitching Change: D. J. Carrasco replaces Clayton Richard.

With Wilson Betemit batting, wild pitch by Vicente Padilla, Jermaine Dye scores.
